item.title: Want Access to the VMworld 2012 Sessions?
item.description: Fellow vExpert Rick Scherer is giving away a voucher that provides free access to all of the VMworld 2012 sessions, including associated MP3′s and PDF’s. Have a look at his post Win Access to VMworld 2012 Sessions and enter to win now! Good stuff Rick, real good! Update October 30th: Fresh VCDX and fellow vExpert Joep Piscaer has followed suit and announced his own “Want to win a VMworld 2012 Subscription?
